# none

**Type Property**

Do not coalesce notifications in the queue.

## Declaration

```swift
static var none: NotificationQueue.NotificationCoalescing { get }
```

## Constants

- **onName**: Coalesce notifications with the same name.
- **onSender**: Coalesce notifications with the same object.

items.description: Coalesce notifications with the same name.
items.name: onName
